verses.text: \w But|strong="H8085"\w* after \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Laban|strong="H3837"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w being|strong="H1121"\w* enriched \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* substance \w is|strong="H0834"\w* become great:

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* perceiving \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* Laban’s \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* towards \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0369"\w* day,

Especially \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w kindred|strong="H4138"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee.

\w He|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Lia \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w where|strong="H0413"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* fed \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* towards \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0369"\w* day: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w to|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* uttermost \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*.

Yea, \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* hath overreached \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w changed|strong="H2498"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w wages|strong="H4909"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w times|strong="H4489"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w yet|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* suffered \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* hurt \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w speckled|strong="H5348"\w* \w shall|strong="H3205"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w speckled|strong="H5348"\w*: \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* contrary: Thou shalt \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* white ones \w for|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* white ones.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H5337"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* substance, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ewes conceiving, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* sleep \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* males \w which|strong="H5869"\w* leaped \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w females|strong="H6629"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* divers colours, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w spotted|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w speckled|strong="H5348"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3290"\w* sleep: \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*? \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w am|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* males leaping \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w females|strong="H6629"\w*, \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* divers colours, \w spotted|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w speckled|strong="H5348"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w Laban|strong="H3837"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w where|strong="H0834"\w* thou didst \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w stone|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w make|strong="H5087"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w native|strong="H4138"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* Lia \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Have|strong="H0001"\w* we \w any|strong="H5750"\w* thing \w left|strong="H5750"\w* \w among|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* goods \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H5750"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?

Hath \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* strangers \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w price|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H5337"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: wherefore \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* thee.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* having \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, \w went|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* substance, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w flocks|strong="H4735"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* gotten \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Mesopotamia, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w forward|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan.

\w At|strong="H6629"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* time \w Laban|strong="H3837"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w shear|strong="H1494"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w stole|strong="H1589"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w her|strong="H1980"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w idols|strong="H8655"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3290"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w would|strong="H3290"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w confess|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* father \w in|strong="H5921"\w* law \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* flying \w away|strong="H1272"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w gone|strong="H1272"\w*, together \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* belonged \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* having \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, \w was|strong="H0834"\w* going \w on|strong="H3605"\w* towards \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* Galaad,

\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Laban|strong="H3837"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w overtook|strong="H1692"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Galaad.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* saw \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Take|strong="H8104"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* thou \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* any \w thing|strong="H7451"\w* harshly \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

Now \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w had|strong="H3290"\w* \w pitched|strong="H8628"\w* \w his|strong="H5381"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w in|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*: \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w when|strong="H8628"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w his|strong="H5381"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w had|strong="H3290"\w* \w overtaken|strong="H5381"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w pitched|strong="H8628"\w* \w his|strong="H5381"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w in|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* Galaad.

\w And|strong="H2719"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w* thus, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w carry|strong="H6213"\w* \w away|strong="H7617"\w*, without \w my|strong="H3290"\w* knowledge, \w my|strong="H3290"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w captives|strong="H7617"\w* \w taken|strong="H7617"\w* \w with|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* wouldst thou run \w away|strong="H7971"\w* privately \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* acquaint \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* might \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H1589"\w* thee \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w timbrels|strong="H8596"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*?

Thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* suffered \w me|strong="H5203"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* kiss \w my|strong="H6258"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w foolishly|strong="H5528"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w indeed|strong="H3808"\w*,

\w It|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* return thee \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: \w but|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H0570"\w*: \w Take|strong="H8104"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* thou \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* not \w any|strong="H3426"\w* \w thing|strong="H7451"\w* harshly \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w Suppose|strong="H3588"\w* thou didst desire \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thy friends, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* hadst \w a|strong="H3588"\w* longing \w after|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou \w stolen|strong="H1589"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*?

\w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* departed unknown \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3290"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* thou wouldst \w take|strong="H1497"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w force|strong="H1497"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* whereas thou chargest \w me|strong="H5978"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* theft: \w with|strong="H5973"\w* whomsoever thou shalt \w find|strong="H4672"\w* thy \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* slain \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.
